tuv.seg: Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission
Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas
The Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission is an independent body set up under the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014 on 1 November 2014
Comhlacht neamhspleách is ea Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas a bunaíodh faoin Acht fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas 2014 an 1 Samhain 2014
Under the Act, the Equality Authority and the Irish Human Rights Commission were dissolved and their functions transferred to the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission
Faoin Acht, díscaoileadh an tÚdarás Comhionannais agus Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus aistríodh a bhfeidhmeanna chuig Coimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas
The functions of the Commission are to:
Is iad feidhmeanna an Choimisiúin:
• Promote and protect human rights and equality
• Cearta an duine agus comhionannas a chur chun cinn agus a chosaint
• Encourage the development of a culture of respect for human rights, equality, and intercultural understanding in the State
• Cultúr measa ar chearta an duine, comhionannas, agus tuiscint idirchultúrtha sa Stát a spreagadh agus a fhorbairt
• Promote understanding and awareness of the importance of human rights and equality in the State
• Tuiscint agus feasacht ar thábhacht chearta an duine agus chomhionannais sa Stát
• Encourage good practice in intercultural relations, to promote tolerance and acceptance of diversity in the State and respect for the freedom and dignity of each person
• Dea-chleachtas a spreagadh i gcaidreamh idirchultúrtha, chun caoinfhulaingt agus glacadh le héagsúlacht a chur chun cinn sa Stát mar aon le meas ar shaoirse agus dínit gach duine
• Work towards the elimination of human rights abuses, discrimination and prohibited conduct
• Oibriú i dtreo mí-úsáid a bhaint as cearta an duine, idirdhealú agus iompar toirmiscthe a dhíbirt
The Commission carries out these functions by:
Tugann an Coimisiún faoi na feidhmeanna seo tríd an méid a leanas a dhéanamh:
• Providing information to the public in relation to human rights and equality generally
• Faisnéis a sholáthar don phobal maidir le cearta an duine agus comhionannas go ginearálta
• Keeping under review the adequacy and effectiveness of law and practice in the State relating to human rights and equality
• Leordhóthanacht agus éifeacht an dlí agus an chleachtais sa Stát a choimeád faoi athbhreithniú maidir le cearta an duine agus comhionannas
• Making recommendations to Government on measures to strengthen, protect and uphold human rights and equality in the State
• Moltaí a dhéanamh don Rialtas ar bhearta chun cearta an duine agus comhionannas a threisiú, a chosaint agus chun seasamh leo sa Stát
• Examining any legislative proposal and report its views on any implications for human rights or equality
• Aon togra reachtaíochta a scrúdú agus tuairisciú a dhéanamh ar a dhearcthaí ar chearta an duine agus comhionannas
• Providing legal assistance to people taking legal proceeding to vindicate their rights (this is subject to certain conditions)
• Cúnamh dlí a sholáthar do dhaoine a ghlacann imeachtaí dlí chun a gcearta a fheidhmiú (tá seo faoi réir roinnt coinníollacha)
• Taking legal proceedings to vindicate human rights in the State
• Imeachtaí dlí a ghlacadh chun cearta an duine a fheidhmiú sa Stát
• Consulting with relevant national and international bodies around human rights or equality issues
• Comhairliúchán a dhéanamh le comhlachtaí náisiúnta agus idirnáisiúnta maidir le saincheisteanna chearta an duine agus comhionannais
• Providing or assisting in the provision of education and training on human rights and equality issues
• Oideachas agus oiliúint a sholáthar nó cabhrú lena soláthar ar shaincheisteanna chearta an duine agus comhionannais
• Carrying out equality reviews and preparing equality action plans
• Tabhairt faoi athbhreithnithe ar chomhionannas agus pleananna gníomhaíochta comhionannais a réiteach
• Conducting inquiries into possible violation of human rights or equality of treatment obligations in the State
• Fiosrúcháin a dhéanamh ar shárú féideartha dhualgais chearta an duine agus um chóir chomhionann sa Stát
• Participating in the Joint Committee of Representatives of members of the Commission and members of the Northern Ireland Human Rights Commission
• Páirt a ghlacadh i gComhchoiste Ionadaithe chomhaltaí an Choimisiúin agus chomhaltaí Choimisiún um Chearta an Duine Thuaisceart Éireann
The Commission can assist you to further human rights issues by assisting you with legal proceedings
Féadfaidh an Coimisiún cabhrú leat chun saincheisteanna chearta an duine a chur chun cinn trí chabhrú leat le do chuid imeachtaí dlí
If you want the Commission to grant assistance in relation to legal proceedings involving issues of human rights you must first be clear what the human right issue is

Más mian leat go dtabharfaidh an Coimisiún cúnamh a dheonú maidir le himeachtaí dlí ina bhfuil baint ag saincheisteanna chearta an duine, ní mór duit a bheith soiléir faoi cén ceart an duine atá i gceist
When you make your request to the Commission:
Nuair a dhéanann tú d’iarratas ar an gCoimisiún:
• Be clear how the legal proceeding is linked to the function of the Commission
• Bí soiléir faoi conas atá an t-imeacht dlí nasctha le feidhm an Choimisiúin
• Identify how the legal proceeding could change how human rights are protected in Ireland
• Sainaithin conas a d’fhéadfadh an t-imeacht dlíthiúil an bealach a chosnaítear cearta an duine in Éirinn a athrú
• You must have made reasonable efforts to get legal assistance elsewhere, for example, civil legal aid or criminal legal aid
• Níor mhór go ndearna tú iarrachtaí réasúnta chun cúnamh dlíthiúil a fháil in áit eile, mar shampla, cúnamh dlí sibhialta nó cúnamh dlí coiriúil
The Commission is not an adjudicator body in respect of complaints of human rights violations in Ireland
Ní comhlacht moltóirí an Coimisiún maidir le gearáin i leith sáruithe ar chearta an duine in Éirinn
It cannot offer remedies or compensation in cases where human rights have been violated
Ní féidir leo réitigh nó cúiteamh a chur ar tairiscint i gcásanna inar sáraíodh cearta an duine
It cannot overturn court, or tribunal decisions, or require government departments to give entitlements to people who may feel they have an entitlement
Ní féidir leo cinntí cúirte, nó binse a chur ar ceal, nó iarraidh ar ranna rialtais chun teidlíochtaí a thabhairt do dhaoine a d’fhéadfadh braistint go bhfuil teidlíocht acu
Contact the Commission for more information about how requests for legal assistance are assessed
Déan teagmháil leis an gCoimisiún chun teacht ar bhreis faisnéise faoi conas a mheasúnaítear iarratais ar chúnamh dlí
There are 2 distinct pieces of legislation in place which set out equality rights for people and specifically outlaw discrimination when it occurs
Tá dhá phíosa reachtaíochta ar leith i bhfeidhm ina leagtar amach cearta comhionannais do dhaoine agus a eisreachtaíonn idirdhealú nuair a tharlaíonn sé

The Employment Equality Acts 1998–2015 and the Equal Status Acts 2000–2015 outlaw discrimination in employment, vocational training, advertising, collective agreements, the provision of goods and services

Eisreachtaíonn na hAchtanna um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998-2015 agus na hAchtanna um Stádas Comhionann 2000-2015 idirdhealú i bhfostaíocht, gairmoiliúint, fógraíocht, comhaontuithe comhchoiteanna, soláthar earraí agus seirbhísí
Specifically, goods and services include professional or trade services; health services; access to accommodation and education; facilities for banking, transport and cultural activities

Go sonrach, áirítear le hearraí agus seirbhísí – seirbhísí gairmiúla nó trádála; seirbhísí sláinte; rochtain ar chóiríocht agus oideachas; áiseanna le haghaidh baincéireachta, iompair agus gníomhaíochtaí cultúrtha
Under equality legislation discrimination based on any one of the following distinct grounds is unlawful. These grounds are:
Faoin reachtaíocht chomhionannais, tá idirdhealú neamhdhleathach má tá sé bunaithe ar aon cheann de na forais seo a leanas:
• Age (does not apply to a person under 16)
• Aois (ní bhaineann seo le duine faoi bhun 16 bliana)
• Membership of the Traveller community
• Ballraíocht den Lucht Siúil

Since 1 January 2016, under the Equal Status Acts 2000–2015, you cannot be discriminated against when renting because you are getting Rent Supplement or any other social welfare payment, or a Housing Assistance Payment

Ó 1 Eanáir 2016, faoi na hAchtanna um Stádas Comhionann 2000-2015, is féidir aon duine a idirdhealú in aghaidh leat nuair a bhíonn tú ar cíos mar go bhfuil tú ag fáil Forlíonadh Cíosa nó aon íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh eile, nó Íocaíocht um Chúnamh Tithíochta
This is known as the housing assistance ground
Tá sé seo ar a dtugtar an talamh cúnaimh tithíochta
Discrimination is defined as less favourable treatment
Is é an sainmhíniú a thugtar ar idirdhealú ná cóir is lú fabhar
A person is said to be discriminated against if they are treated less favourably than another is, has been or would be treated in a comparable situation on any of the grounds mentioned above

Deirtear go ndearnadh idirdhealú i leith duine mura gcaitear chomh fabhrach céanna leis nó léi agus a chaitear le duine eile, agus a caitheadh le duine eile nó agus a chaithfí le duine eile ina mhacasamhail de chás ar aon cheann de na forais atá luaite thuas

To establish direct discrimination, a direct comparison must be made, for example, in the case of disability discrimination the comparison must be between a person who has a disability and another who has not, or between persons with different disabilities

Chun idirdhealú a dheimhniú, ní mór comparáid dhíreach a dhéanamh, mar shampla, i gcás idirdhealú míchumais, ní mór go bhfuil an chomparáid idir duine atá faoi mhíchumas agus duine eile nach bhfuil, nó idir daoine atá faoi mhíchumais éagsúla
Indirect discrimination occurs when practices or policies that do not appear to discriminate against one group more than another actually have a discriminatory impact

Tarlaíonn idirdhealú indíreach nuair a tharlaíonn sé go n-imríonn cleachtais nó beartais tionchar idirdhealaitheach, nach dealraitheach a dhéanann idirdhealú níos mó i leith grúpa amháin ná mar a imríonn siad ar ghrúpa eile
It can also happen where a requirement that may appear non-discriminatory
Féadfaidh sé tarlú, chomh maith, nuair a imríonn riachtanas tionchar idirdhealaitheach a bhfuil an chuma air nach amhlaidh atá á dhéanamh aige
Complaints under the Employment Equality Acts 1998-2015 must be brought within 6 months of the last act of discrimination
Ní mór gearáin faoi na hAchtanna um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998-2015 a dhéanamh laistigh de 6 mhí ó tharla an gníomh deiridh idirdhealaithe
You can make a complaint to the Workplace Relations Commission using the online complaint form on workplacerelations.ie
Féadfaidh tú gearán a dhéanamh chuig an gCoimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre trí leas a bhaint as an bhfoirm ghearáin ar líne atá ar fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
To make a complaint under the Equal Status Acts 2000-2015 you must first notify the person or organisation you are making the complaint against within 2 months of the last act of discrimination

Chun gearán a dhéanamh faoi na hAchtanna um Stádas Comhionann, 2000-2015, ní mór duit an duine nó an eagraíocht a chur ar an eolas a bhfuil an gearán á dhéanamh agat fúthu laistigh de 2 mhí tar éis go ndearnadh an gníomh deiridh idirdhealaithe

If you are not satisfied with the service provider's response, or if they have made no response within 1 month from the date you notified them, you can bring a complaint to the Workplace Relations Commission within 6 months of the last act of discrimination

Mura bhfuil tú sásta le freagairt sholáthróir na seirbhíse, nó murar thug siad aon fhreagairt laistigh de mhí amháin ón dáta a chuir tú ar an eolas iad, féadfaidh tú gearán a chur faoi bhráid an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre laistigh de 6 mhí tar éis an ghnímh deiridh idirdhealaithe
You can read more information in our document, Disputes about equality and discrimination
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Díospóidí faoi chomhionannas agus idirdhealú
